hadiths.text: Narrated Nafi`:`Abdullah bin `Umar said, "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, 'Accept the marriage invitation if you are invited to it.' " Ibn `Umar used to accept the invitation whether to a wedding banquet or to any other party, even when he was fasting

chapter.ara-name: باب إِجَابَةِ الدَّاعِي فِي الْعُرْسِ وَغَيْرِه
chapter.eng-name: To accept the invitation to a party
